articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Jong Il Sim, Korean resident in Russia, Friday on the occasion of the New Year Juche 98 (2009).
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "We wholeheartedly wish the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il good health".

articles.title: Single-minded Unity Fully Displayed in 2008
articles.content:
Single-minded Unity Fully Displayed in 2008
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The might of single-minded unity, the symbol of Juche Korea and the greatest national strength, was eloquently demonstrated again in Juche 97 (2008).
					From the beginning of the year the Korean people launched into a daring all-out offensive on all fronts of socialist construction with indomitable spirit in response to the militant slogan of the Workers' Party of Korea "Glorify This Year of the 60th Anniversary of the Founding of the DPRK as a Year of Historical Turn Which Will Go Down in the History of the Country".
					
					Fierce flames of technical updating and production upsurge flared up at major industrial establishments including the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and a project of UHP electric arc furnace was completed at the Chollima Steel Complex. In the meantime, lots of monumental edifices including Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No.1 and the Chongdan County Gravity-fed Waterway have taken shape and modern production bases cropped up in all parts of the country, which will help improve the people's standard of living.
					
					Pyongyang has been face-lifted and scenery of socialist fairyland has been unfolded in many places including the Unhung Co-op Farm, Thaechon County, North Phyongan Province. And specific fruits have been gathered in socialist cultural construction. To cite an example, a new representation was given to the orchestra and chorus "Snow Falls" to make it a hit listed as a national treasure. 
					
					The might of single-minded unity of Korea was demonstrated through the political events commemorating the 60th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					The statues of President Kim Il Sung standing in all parts of the country and the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show venues were full of yearning and veneration for the President growing day by day and all the venues of celebrations including the national meeting and the national photo exhibition celebrating the 60th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK were grand epical scenes of the single-minded unity of Korea. 
					
					Members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards displayed through a mammoth parade the spirit and might of the revolutionary civilian armed forces of Juche which have grown into invincible fighting ranks.
					
					The torchlight procession of youth and students under the title "The Motherland of Songun" marking the 60th birthday of the DPRK showed the unshakable pledge of the third and forth generations of the Korean revolution to make a long journey of Songun revolution true to the Workers' Party of Korea in one mind and one will, come what may. 
					
					The political events in September were a grand demonstration of the immutable faith and will of the Korean people to share destiny with the Workers' Party of Korea and socialist motherland to the end, trusting their leader. 
					
					The Korean people will as ever remain rallied close around the headquarters of revolution in one idea and one will and adorn the history of the DPRK with victory and glory.

articles.title: Housing Construction Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Housing Construction Progresses Apace
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government has paid deep attention to the construction of dwelling houses.
					The dwelling construction is in full swing in Mansudae Street in the heart of Pyongyang and other parts of the city.
					
					The Pyongyang City Construction Guidance Bureau is making positive efforts to build various types of dwelling houses in Mansudae Street that goes with other main streets of the city in a formative art. It is effecting innovations in construction by introducing monolithic concrete tamping and precast construction methods.
					
					Provinces, cities and counties are also building dwellings suitable to local conditions, thus changing their looks.
					
					Kim Jong Suk County, Ryanggang Province, has fixed blocks for the construction of dwelling houses in a well-defined framework in accordance with the street miniature of the township before pushing ahead with the construction speed by tapping raw materials and internal reserves available there.
					
					Hundreds of dwelling houses are under construction in the City of Hoeryong and similar construction is going on in other cities and counties of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					This year has witnessed the construction of lots of dwellings suitable to architectural features in Hyongjesan District and Sunan District of Pyongyang and other towns, counties and districts of the country.
					
					A turn has been effected in the construction of rural dwelling houses, too, with the result that new rural villages commensurate with the socialist society have made their appearance.
					
					Dwelling houses were built or repaired in rural areas including Raerim-ri, Jaeryong County and Sinchang-ri, Sinwon County of South Hwanghae Province.
					
					Villages with houses for patients have come into being in the form of modern rural dwellings in Talchon hot spring in Samchon County, South Hwanghae Province, Wonhung hot spring in Tongsin County, Jagang Province, Kalsan hot spring in Phangyo County, Kangwon Province and Hwangjin hot spring in Myongchon County, North Hamgyong Province. 
					
					Thanks to the popular policy of the Workers' Party of Korea, the dwelling houses built at the state expense are being distributed to people free of charge.

articles.title: Mass Physical Culture and Sports Activities Get Brisk
articles.content:
Mass Physical Culture and Sports Activities Get Brisk
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Physical culture and sports activities have been further popularized in the DPRK in the year of 2008.
					Industrial establishments and co-op farms in different parts of the country have made use of sports bulletin boards to inform the working people of various common knowledge and data on physical culture and sports and striven hard to arrange sports facilities.
					
					They have made it an inseparable part of daily life of the working people to do Taekwon-Do exercise for health and mass rhythmic gymnastics and colorful sports games have been organized on the sports days and other occasions.
					
					The schools have raised the quality of physical education class and led all the students to take part in after-school physical culture and sports activities while pushing forward the work for securing necessary sports apparatuses and facilities.
					
					As a result, lots of units have been honored with the titles of "Model Physical Training Factory (Institution, Enterprise)", "Model Physical Training Farm", "Twice Model Physical Training School" and "Model Physical Training School".
					
					Colorful sports games were held this year, among them the 13th Paektusan Cup Sports Contest of Officials from National Institutions, the National Basketball Games of Agricultural Working People, the 7th National Traditional Sports Contest of Agricultural Working People for marking the 60th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK, the 39th Sports Contest of Artistes, the National Students Sports Contest for September 5 Cup and the 12th National Basketball Games for August 28 Youth Cup among Youths and Students.
					
					All the players in the games gave full play to their noble collectivist spirit and high-level sports technique which they have cultivated through mass sports activities.
					
					Notably, the Sixth National Ssirum (Korean wrestling) Tournament for Grand Bull Prize was held at the Ssirum Ground on Rungra Island before full audience. Folk game contests such as the national folk game contest of school children and the folk sports and amusement games of women's union members were held with a large number of participants across the country on several anniversaries.
					
					The afore-said mass physical culture and sports activities made the whole country replete with the revolutionary spirit.

articles.title: U.S. War Hysteria under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. War Hysteria under Fire
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- This year the U.S. hard-line conservative forces have perpetrated unprecedented provocative moves in a bid to bring the six-party talks to deadlock, check the settlement of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and strain the situation on the peninsula.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					Accusing the U.S. hard-line conservative forces of letting loose a whole string of malignant remarks to lay a hurdle in the way of the progress of the six-party talks, the article notes that this is designed to achieve their criminal purpose to render the DPRK-U.S. relations extremely tense and thus execute their hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. bellicose forces to drive the situation to the brink of a war by increasing the pressure upon the DPRK with a hard-line big stick policy, not through the negotiated solution of the problem, and torpedoing denuclearization process on the peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces have staged frantic war exercises targeted against the DPRK by mobilizing their allied forces at a time when the denuclearization was under way on the peninsula. This clearly indicates that they do not stand for the peaceful settlement of the nuclear issue but seek to stem the trend of dialogue and peace and stifle the DPRK by force of arms. 
					
					Their reckless military hysteria this year proves once again that they are stepping up their preparations for a war behind the scene of dialogue and their wild ambition to invade and dominate the DPRK by force of arms remains unchanged. The U.S. loudmouthed "peace" and "stability," however, are nothing but a smokescreen to cover up their scenario for invading the DPRK. Their plan to start a war of aggression against the DPRK remains unchanged.
					
					 The U.S. double-dealing tactics will never work on the DPRK.
					
					 It is the DPRK's independent mode of retaliation to counter the enemy brandishing a knife with a long sword and his use of gun with an artillery piece. The U.S. imperialists' policy to stifle the DPRK militarily is bound to go bust. 
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces would be well advised to behave themselves, properly understanding the mental power and military muscle of the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Ulterior Intention Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Ulterior Intention Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Lee Myung Bak gentries told a cock-and-bull story about "dialogue" to the effect that it is due to the north that the inter-Korean dialogue was suspended and the inter-Korean relations are inching close to the worst phase. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					 Minju Joson today observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 How to approach the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is a touchstone to discern whether one wants dialogue or not because they were accepted by all Koreans as a milestone of national reunification.
					
					 Traitor Lee has been hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen since he adopted the treacherous and anti-reunification watchword "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" as his "policy toward the north," totally negating the north-south joint declarations. Lee torpedoed the inter-Korean dialogue by abandoning of his own accord the status as a dialogue partner.
					
					 It is nothing but a brazen-faced wordplay for the Lee group to call for dialogue as it is the arch criminal who scuttled the inter-Korean dialogue.
					
					 What the group wants is neither the inter-Korean dialogue nor the improvement of the relations. Its ulterior motive is getting on the nerves of the army and people of the DPRK by passing the buck for the suspended dialogue to the north in a bid to further strain the inter-Korean relations and intensify the suppression of the progressive pro-reunification forces under this pretext and tide over the deepening ruling crisis. Precisely for this reason it is trumpeting about "dialogue" in an attempt to create an impression that it is interested in the inter-Korean dialogue and misleading the public opinion.
					
					But, such poor trick will never work in this bright world. This will only add to the crimes committed by the group against the nation as it is a criminal act of insulting and mocking at the compatriots desirous of national reconciliation and unity and the independent reunification.
					
					If the Lee group is truly interested in the inter-Korean dialogue, it should make an apology to the nation for having deteriorated the inter-Korean relations, roll back its "policy toward the north" calling for confrontation with fellow countrymen and clarify its stand to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. If the group persists in the confrontation with fellow countrymen, making an empty talk about "dialogue" without taking such practical measures, it will have to pay a very high price for the above-said crimes.

articles.title: All-Night Sit-in Strike Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-Night Sit-in Strike Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Representatives of peasant organizations in south Korea went into an all-night sit-in strike in Seoul on Dec. 22 to check the passage of the "motion calling for the ratification of the south Korea-U.S. FTA" through the "National Assembly."
					 At the press conference held prior to the sit-in strike Han To Suk, chairperson of the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea, and other speakers said that the passage of the said motion through the NA is little short of a suicidal act as it means giving up the future of agriculture now that the world is plagued with a food crisis.
					
					The tyrannical regime of Lee Myung Bak disregarding the people's will and the "Grand National Party", a group of gangsters, had better retract at once the motion calling for the NA ratification of FTA if they are afraid of the people, they warned.
					
					 A press release read out at the conference deplored that the present south Korean society looks just the same as what used to be in the period of the "fifth republic" as the ruling party which occupies majority seats of the NA has been reduced to a tool of the president, railroading all kinds of Lee's evil bills through it.
					
					The peasant organizations decided to hold an emergency peasant meeting to check the NA ratification of the south Korea-U.S. FTA and judge Lee Myung Bak and GNP in Seoul on Dec. 29.

articles.title: Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee for Releasing Yun Ki Jin, chairman of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification, in south Korea made public a statement on Dec. 20 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its brutal suppression of pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					The statement accused the Seoul High Court of taking such a tyrannical action as sentencing the above-said chairman to a heavy penalty on Dec. 19, declaring this cannot but be an act of treachery against reunification.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime should clearly know that all the successive regimes that went against the will of the nation and the people met a stern punishment by history as the past history showed, it warned, demanding the Lee regime step down as it has cracked down upon the pro-reunification patriotic forces while totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Jongyojo under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Jongyojo under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea released a statement on Dec. 20 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak puppet group for their crackdown upon the Teachers' Union of south Korea (Jongyojo).
					The statement accused the prosecution authorities of perpetrating such violent actions as searching the office of the Seoul branch of Jongyojo and confiscating documents there on Dec. 11 on unreasonable charges and committing similar crimes in the office of Progressive Network on Dec. 19.
					
					 This rowdyism is nothing but an undisguised targeted search and suppression perpetrated by the Lee regime under the pretext of "security" as it is aimed to destroy Jongyojo at any cost, regarding it as a thorn in its flesh, it charged.
					
					 It urged the prosecution authorities, a waiting maid of the Lee regime, to immediately halt the suppression of Jongyojo and the Lee regime to step down at once as it is keen to bring back the era of dictatorship.

articles.title: GNP's Moves to Put Media under Its Control Slammed
articles.content:
GNP's Moves to Put Media under Its Control Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- 48 civic and public organizations including the Federation of Press Trade Unions and the Journalists Association held a press conference on December 23 disclosing the puppet group's behind-the-scene moves to put media under their control, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 They in their statement charged that the moves stepped up by the "Grand National Party" to enact seven evil laws aimed at putting media under their control including the "bill on the revision of the law on broadcasting" are designed to create an environment favorable for them as they found it hard to seek a long-term power by relying on the impartial broadcasting services. 
					
					 They denounced the GNP for using the misinformation released by such conservative media as Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo as it is allowing big businesses to own broadcasting services, obliterating fairness and truth of the broadcasting.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Moscow on Dec. 22 under the co-sponsorship of the Communist Party of Soviet Union and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK to mark the 17th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were photos and books showing the undying feats of the three generals of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Vladimir Veredin, secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Soviet Union, said that the august names of Kim Il Sung, eternal president of the DPRK, and Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, have become a symbol of hope for the world progressive people.
					
					 Kurilrova, member of the Central Committee of the party, said that Kim Jong Suk resolutely defended Kim Il Sung's idea and line, regarding them as absolute faith and devoted her all to their materialization, adding that her noblest feat is that she gave birth to and brought up the great leader capable of carrying forward Kim Il Sung's idea and cause through generations.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Meanwhile, lectures and film shows were held in South Africa, Pakistan and Ethiopia between Dec. 17 and 19.

articles.title: Magazine "Korean Information" Published
articles.content:
Magazine "Korean Information" Published
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association brought out the third issue of its magazine "Korean Information" on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The magazine told about the fact that Kim Jong Il has defended the sovereignty of the country and socialism, frustrating the U.S. and other imperialist reactionary forces' moves to stifle the DPRK with his original Songun politics.
					
					 It dealt with the proud course of 60 years covered by the DPRK under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Referring to the concrete contents and validity of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, the magazine called on the world progressive people to extend full support to the Korean people in the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration by means of federation.
					
					Also carried in it were articles denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak for his madcap pro-U.S. sycophantic and anti-reunification moves and disclosing the barbarous atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean people during the Korean War.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Observe Significant Days of DPRK
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Observe Significant Days of DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Association of Koreans in China took place on Dec. 23 and events of compatriots in Uzbekistan on Dec. 23 and 24 to mark the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the general association, in his report said that after scientifically penetrating into the grave situation prevailed before the Korean revolution, Kim Jong Il has pursued in an overall way the Songun politics based on the Juche idea to strengthen the People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army fully prepared in political and ideological and military technical aspects.
					
					 All the Koreans in China should more dynamically conduct the patriotic movement for prosperity of their homeland and national reunification true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il while looking back with deep emotion on the proud course of progress made under his guidance.
					
					 The participants in the events held in Uzbekistan laid a floral basket before the full-length portrait of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together at the DPRK embassy and made bows to them and looked round a photo exhibition on the theme of "60 years of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea."
					
					 Jo Yun Hae, chairman of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification, in a speech made at a celebration meeting lauded the sacred life of Kim Jong Suk, a great revolutionary and a model of bodyguard, and referred to the fact that the dignity and honor of the DPRK are shining all over the world as it has Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 At the end of the meeting an art performance was given.
					
					 Meanwhile, Koreans in China held a seminar on the greatness of Kim Jong Suk and a recorded lecture in Shenyang on Dec. 23 on the occasion of her 91st birth anniversary.

articles.title: Resumption of DPRK-Japan Talks Called for
articles.content:
Resumption of DPRK-Japan Talks Called for
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea sent a written request to the Japanese prime minister and foreign minister on Dec. 17 in which it demanded the resumption of the DPRK-Japan talks for normalizing the bilateral relations and others.
					 The request urged the Japanese government to lift the sanctions against the DPRK, make economic compensation according to the agreement reached at the six-party talks and resume the talks for normalizing the relations.
					
					 Representative members of the committee Zun Shimizu, Hirokazu Kitagawa and Setsuo Yoshihara urged the Japanese government to normalize Japan's relations with the DPRK as early as possible according to the Pyongyang Declaration and solve the issue of suppression of Koreans in Japan, part of its sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: GNP's Unilateral Action Flayed
articles.content:
GNP's Unilateral Action Flayed
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a statement released on Dec. 18 warned that if the Lee Myung Bak "government" brings the north-south relations to collapse in the end and favors the neo-liberal economic policy of the U.S., the economy will plunge into a deeper mire of bankruptcy and it will reduce south Korea to an economic colony of foreign forces in the long run.
					 Accusing the Grand National Party of south Korea of unilaterally ramming the "motion calling for the ratification of south Korea-U.S. FTA" through the "Committee of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Unification of the National Assembly" that day, the statement condemned the Lee Myung Bak regime and the GNP for driving the people to death to meet only their own interests.
					
					FTA will further reduce south Korea to an economic colony of the U.S. and bring its economy to ruin, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The conclusion of FTA will precipitate its ruin and it is the only way for economic recovery to nullify the humiliating "agreement" and normalize the south-north relations.
					
					The GNP should stop such act as driving big nails into the hearts of people, urged the statement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de la familia de Jong Il Sim
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de la familia de Jong Il Sim
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores que le dirigiera el dia 26 la familia de Jong Il Sim, coreano residente en Rusia con motivo del Ano Nuevo del 98 (2009) de la Era Juche.
					En la cinta del cesto se lee: "Formulamos  sinceros votos por la salud del gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il".

articles.title: Actividades deportivas masivas en desarrollo
articles.content:
Actividades deportivas masivas en desarrollo
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En 2008 se desarrollaron animadamente las actividades deportivas masivas en Corea.
					Los funcionarios de las fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas de todas partes del pais dieron a conocer varios conocimientos elementales y datos relativos al deporte a los trabajadores mediante varios murales y se esforzaron activamente por disponer de distintas instalaciones deportivas.
					
					Popularizan el Taekwon-do para la salud y la gimnasia ritmica masiva y, en particular, organizaron ampliamente diversos juegos deportivos en  los dias deportivos determinados.
					
					Las escuelas impulsaron las labores para dotar suficientemente de los instrumentos necesarios a las actividades deportivas y mejoraron la calidad de la clase deportiva hicieron para que todos los alumnos participen en las actividades deportivas extraescolares.
					
					En ese decurso, muchas unidades obtuvieron los titulos de "Fabrica (organo y empresa) Modelo en el Deporte", "Granja Modelo en el Deporte", "Doble Escuela Modelo en el Deporte" y "Escuela Modelo en el Deporte".
					
					Este ano, tuvieron lugar diversos Torneos Deportivos, entre ellos, el XIII Torneo Deportivo por "Copa Paektusan" de los funcionarios de los organos centrales, el Torneo Nacional de Baloncesto de Trabajadores Agricolas, el VII Torneo Nacional de Deportes Nacionales de Trabajadores Agricolas por el 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica, el 39o Torneo Deportivo de Artistas, el Torneo Deportivo Nacional de Estudiantes por "Copa 5 de Septiembre" y la "XII Competencia Nacional de Baloncesto por Copa Juventud 28 de Agosto" de Jovenes y  Estudiantes.
					
					Todos los participantes en dichos juegos mostraron sin reserva su habilidad deportiva ejercitada en las actividades deportivas masivas y el  noble  espiritu colectivista.
					
					En particular, se realizo con exito el VI Torneo Nacional de Lucha Coreana por el "Premio Gran Toro" en la Cancha de Lucha en la isla Rungra de esta capital y se efectuaron animadamente los juegos folcloricos incluyendo el torneo folclorico nacional de ninos y escolares y el de juegos deportivos y recreativos nacionales de las miembros de la Union de Mujeres dedicados a varias fiestas.
					
					Tales actividades de deporte masivo hicieron reinar el impetu revolucionario en todo el pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a las fuerzas conservadoras norteamericanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a las fuerzas conservadoras norteamericanas
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun en su articulo individual difundido  este viernes revela que se perpetraron sin precedentes este ano las maquinaciones agresivas de las fuerzas ultraconservadoras de Estados Unidos tendentes a fracasar las conversaciones a 6 bandas, impedir la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y agravar la situacion de esta.
					Tales fuerzas yanquis enumeraron sofismas para poner obstaculos en el avance de la cita a 6 bandas y realizar su politica hostil a la RPDC agravando al extremo las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU., senala el articulista y continua:
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas de EE.UU. pretenden intensificar la presion sobre la RPDC mediante la politica intransigente y dura en lugar de resolver el problema a traves del dialogo y negociaciones y frustrar el proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y, a la larga, llevar la situacion al borde de la guerra.
					
					Cuando se promueve la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas desplegaron freneticas maniobras belicas contra la RPDC movilizando a sus fuerzas satelites, lo cual demuestra claramente que ellas no quieren resolver por via pacifica el problema nuclear sino volver atras la corriente del dialogo y la paz y aplastar con la fuerza a la RPDC.
					
					La locura militar de estas fuerzas  norteamericanas perpetrada este ano vuelve a mostrar a las claras que estas aceleran entre los bastidores del dialogo sus preparativos belicos y que no se cambiaron  sus ambiciones para agredir y dominar a la RPDC. EE.UU. habla de la "paz" y la "estabilidad" de la Peninsula Coreana, pero, eso no pasa de ser una cortina para encubrir su intento agresivo contra la RPDC. Es invariable la intencion de este imperio para desatar la guerra agresiva contra esta.
					
					El doble rasero de EE.UU. no puede convencer jamas a la RPDC. Esta respondera al cuchillo de los enemigos con la espada y al fusil de estos con el canon.
					
					La politica de aplastamiento militar de EE.UU .con respecto a la RPDC no evitara la bancarrota. Las fuerzas belicas norteamericanas deben darse clara cuenta de la fuerza espiritual y la militar de la RPDC y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica intencion de Lee Myung Bak en torno al dialogo N-S
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica intencion de Lee Myung Bak en torno al dialogo N-S
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este viernes, el periodico Minju Joson revela que lo esencial de la enganosa demanda sobre el "dialogo", que formula ultimamente la banda de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea, es que la RPDC es la culpable del cese del dialogo Norte-Sur y de la peor situacion actual de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					Para este caso viene como anillo al dedo el refran coreano: "El ladron se queja primero del robo", ironiza el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					La posicion y la actitud sobre la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, aceptadas por todos los coreanos como jalon de reunificacion de la patria, constituyen la pauta que distingue a los partidarios del dialogo de los oponentes a esto.
					
					Negandolas totalmente, el traidor Lee persiguio locamente la confrontacion fratricida tomando la teoria de "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares", de caracter antinacional y anti-reunificacion, como su "politica sobre el Norte". De esta manera, Lee desclasifico a si mismo para el dialogo con el Norte, que fue abortado por su culpa. Sin embargo, ahora este responsable del fracaso de las conversaciones intercoreanas esta demandandolas descaradamente.
					
					Lo que desea la horda de Lee no es el dialogo ni la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. Su verdadera intencion es buscar el empeoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas provocando al ejercito y al pueblo de la RPDC al imputarle la responsabilidad por el cese del dialogo y tomarlo como pretexto para intensificar la represion a las fuerzas progresistas por la reunificacion y salir de esta manera de la cada dia peor crisis de gobernacion. He aqui la razon por la cual esos compinches distraen la opinion publica hablando del "dialogo" como si estuvieran interesados en las conversaciones con el Norte.
					
					Pero, este truco tan torpe no puede enganar a nadie en el mundo actual tan claro.
					
					Al contrario, abultara el expediente de los crimenes antinacionales cometidos por esa horda siendo otro acto criminal que burla e insulta a los connacionales que desean la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion independiente de la nacion coreana.
					
					Si la camarilla de Lee esta interesada de veras en el dialogo, debe pedir disculpas a la nacion por haber llevado al caos las relaciones Norte-Sur, renunciar a su "politica sobre el Norte" a favor de la confrontacion fratricida y poner en claro su posicion de ejecutar las dos declaraciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Si ella recurre a las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida hablando hipocritamente del "dialogo" sin tomar tales medidas practicas, tendra que pagarlo muy caro.
